source_logic_for_cold_season_dormancy: Bustard, H. R. (1968). The ecology of the Australian gecko, Gehyra variegata, in northern New South Wales. Journal of Zoology, 154(1), 113-138.

notes_for_cold_season_dormancy: high latitude and altitude populations in genus tend to hibernate

source_logic_for_cold_season_dormancy: no info - based on climate (Australia)

source_logic_for_cold_season_dormancy: Piantoni, C., Cussac, V., & Ibargüengoytía, N. (2006). Amphibia-Reptilia, 27(3), 385-392.
notes: For diet, ref states all Phymaturus are herbivourous
